LetsNotDryOutTheFuture.title: Let's Not Dry Out The Future
LetsNotDryOutTheFuture.subtitle: Soil Moisture Monitoring Project
LetsNotDryOutTheFuture.description: Project for monitoring soil moisture using sensors and Reticulum network. The goal is to develop sustainable practices for monitoring and maintaining soil moisture.
LetsNotDryOutTheFuture.technologyDescription: We use 6 soil moisture sensors connected via Reticulum network. Data is collected in real-time and is accessible through our website.
LetsNotDryOutTheFuture.goal2: Development of sustainable practices for maintaining soil moisture
LetsNotDryOutTheFuture.goal3: Public education about the importance of soil moisture
